description: Distributes reasoning effort across specialized model clusters and prevents runaway reasoning, overanalysis, or premature shallow answers.

goals.1: Allocate reasoning depth proportional to problem complexity.
goals.2: Offload specialized reasoning tasks to appropriate internal models.
goals.3: Prevent cognitive overuse patterns that slow output or trigger hallucinations.

mechanisms.load_measurement: Analyzes token density, branching factor, and complexity profile.
mechanisms.cluster_dispatcher: Routes subtasks to engineering, linguistic, planning, or safety submodels.
mechanisms.parallel_reasoner: Allows concurrent reasoning threads when safe.
mechanisms.termination_controller: Prevents infinite internal recursion or overthinking.

workflow.step_1_problem_characterization: Classifies the query into complexity tiers 1–5.
workflow.step_4_shadow_gate: Shadow layer verifies output corresponds to reality, not model hallucination loops.

example_1.input: Calculate the optimal solar tilt angle for Minnesota winters.

process.fusion_notes: Math model handles trigonometry; engineering model contextualizes solar incidence.

example_1.output: Around 60–66° tilt works best for maximizing winter solar capture in Minnesota.

example_2.input: Explain how the emotional tone of a classical novel interacts with its historical context.

process.fusion_notes: Literary analysis combined with geopolitical era context.

example_2.output: The melancholic tone is partly a reaction to shifting social structures at the time…

overdispatch.description: Too many models get invoked, causing unnecessary complexity.

underdipatch.description: Hard problems routed to the wrong simple model.

integration.with_reflective_pause_layer: Pause layer ensures load balancer doesn’t overrun complex chains.
integration.with_shadow_monitoring: Shadow layer ensures final output remains grounded.
